title: Women representation in the literature department
summary: This chart shows the percentage of Women enrolled in department .

The representation is highest within STEM fields , with Engineering showing the highest representation at 70 percentage , followed by Computer_Science with a 60 percentage representation and Mathematics with 56 percentage of Women represented .
Only 32 percentage of Women are now represented in Arts and 24 percentage in Literature , indicating a decline in Arts and Humanities in favour STEM fields .
gold: The following graph show the percentage representation of women in the literature department . Engineering has the most representation at 70 % . Literature has the lowest percent representation at 22 % .
